visible_components: Final drive cover plate (sprocket hub cover)
Final drive recoil/guard bracket (partial, upper right)

findings.component: Final drive cover plate (sprocket hub cover)
findings.observation: CAT yellow painted cover plate is visible and seated. Surface shows moderate paint loss, light surface scratching, and minor scuff marks across face. No visible cracks or deformation detected on face of cover. Center boss appears intact.

Approximately 18-20 bolts visible in circular pattern around the hub cover. Multiple bolt heads show significant surface corrosion and paint loss, appearing silver/bare metal. Several bolt heads exhibit heavy rust oxidation. No visibly missing bolts detected, but corrosion level on fastener heads is notable. Torque condition cannot be verified visually.

Outer ring of the final drive case is visible surrounding the bolt circle. Heavy surface rust and oxidation present across entire visible ring surface. Dark debris and organic material (leaf/dirt accumulation) packed around the perimeter gap between cover and ring, potentially masking seal condition underneath.

Large outer circular guard/frame shroud visible. Heavy uniform surface rust and oxidation across entire visible face. No visible structural cracks or deformation detected, but corrosion is advanced. Consistent with prolonged outdoor/field exposure.

findings.component: Final drive perimeter seal area (inferred edge only)
findings.observation: Heavy accumulation of compressed organic debris (shredded material, dirt) is packed around the entire circumference between the cover plate and outer housing ring. This debris accumulation obscures direct view of the final drive lip seal. Cannot confirm seal integrity. Debris packing of this nature can accelerate seal wear and retain moisture promoting corrosion.
A partial bracket and what appears to be a single bolt or pin is visible at the upper right of the frame. Limited visibility; appears intact but surface corrosion is present.

fusion_result.fusion_notes: Voice input unavailable. Findings derived solely from visual inference.
